Wild Monster List: In Progress
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: General QA: Wild Monster List: In Progress
By Lisa Shock on Friday, August 6, 2010 - 06:49 pm:

Under Construction

Just thought it would be fun to post the wild monsters as we find them. Please post your info, as a reply to this message, as follows with no spaces:

Name,breed,main/sub,Pow,Int,Ski,Spd,Def,Lif,description

This format allows me to enter the data into a chart in the site formatting system.

If there are any typos in the game, please repeat them in your post, do not correct them, we strive for accuracy.

One I have updated the chart, I will add your name to the credits and delete your post.

MonthNameBreedMain/SubPowIntSkiSpdDefLifDescription
8SwowzoSuezoSuezo/Suezo108175164180128132This monster's got a "wow" factor to watch out for, which is how it got its name. It's been seen on the main road.
8JohnnyMewMew/Mew138177133102138162Johnny is willing to sacrifice his own life for a friend. There is a warrant for his capture due to excessive raging in the streets. He's thought to be hiding away in the forest.

By VenomousX on Friday, August 6, 2010 - 06:57 pm:

Is there any way to check the wild monsters you've already collected info on at the guide center? I looked all through "data" in-game and couldn't find a list =/

By VenomousX on Friday, August 6, 2010 - 07:52 pm:

In the meantime, I'll add the new ones as I see them.

Gradar,Zan,Zan/Zan,259,356,235,290,308,287,Gradar is almost impossible to find come nightfall. It is drawn to light and sweet nectar, but it's essence is not fully known. Gradar has been spotted roaming the ice ridge.

By Kitty Meow Meow on Friday, August 6, 2010 - 08:04 pm:

Taro,Hare,Hare/Hare,293,324,342,328,364,280,Taro went to the ice ridge on a drill once, but got stranded and ended up going wild. At times, it seems to remember its breeder, but never intends to leave the ice ridge.

Extra info: Rank B, Month 12, Bounty: 4000

Hatori,Shibasa,Zan/Falco,379,432,354,400,387,334,Once vowed complete loyalty to its master, but when its master betrayed it, Hatori could no longer trust anyone. Today it lives a quiet life of solitude deep in the jungle.

Extra info: Rank A, Month 12, Bounty: 3500

By VenomousX on Saturday, August 7, 2010 - 03:53 pm:

Good idea with the extra info Kitty :)

Horus,Falco,Falco/Falco,436,468,354,412,424,285,Loves nothing more than a good fight with a worthy opponent. Whenever it comes across a monster, it starts swinging away! Right now it's waiting at the ruins in hopes for someone stronger than itself to come along for a fight.

Extra Info: Rank A, Month 5, Bounty: 5000

Torry,Phoenix,Phoenix/Phoenix,364,387,400,362,383,321,Torry has stirred the anger of many by suddenly appearing on the snowy alps and melting the snow with its incredible heat. If Torry isn't defeated at once all of the snow will melt away.

Extra Info: Rank A, Month 5, Bounty: 5000

By Thorr on Saturday, August 7, 2010 - 06:38 pm:

Perfect Guide gas the complete list. The ones I have seen posted so far are in the list.

FYI - There are 42 total Wild Monsters.

The guide actually tells you exactly what techs they know and how they have them arranged. It also tells you where you can find them to actually fight them. For example, the first one that Lisa mentions is Swowzo. The guide states that it shows up on the Angwass Road errantry in month 8. It is Rank D and has only 2 techs.

By Thorr on Saturday, August 7, 2010 - 07:45 pm:
